description:
An fps puzzle game about exploration, music and cyberpunk

This game was made for the #cyberpunkjam 2014 during the period of 3 days

Manual()

{

+Recomended with Headphones+

Left-Click or press Enter to skip Images

WASD: Move

Space:Jump

}

Credits()

{

-Panajoti Rriska(aka Panos Lennon) 

-Alicia Devaux: 2D Art of Cover and Menus and Endings, additional help with Dialogs and Story

}

Game()

{

Level1: Escape 

Level2: Dynamic Music level

Level3: Make a choice

}

Rewards()

{

The songs of the game in an mp3 format 320k

just email me the end that you got at panoslennon@gmail.com 

}

Music by Panos Lennon
